original_file: 待处理知识库\SRMS Support\财务部要求停止生成Rentup.docx

qa_pairs.question: 相关问题
qa_pairs.answer:
文档来源：财务部要求停止生成Rentup

当小区离场，财务部会要求停止生成账单，和停止生成Rentup & Demand Note
查询当前生效的Recurring
select * from cmrecc where BLDGID in (select BLDGID from BLDG where ENTITYID in (select ENTITYID from ENTITY where PROJID = '70226')) and LASTBILL = '2022-09-30'
将其更新EndDate
update cmrecc set LASTBILL = '20241031' enddate = '20241031' where BLDGID in (select BLDGID from BLDG where ENTITYID in (select ENTITYID from ENTITY where PROJID = '70226')) and LASTBILL = '2022-09-30'
最后删除MRIEVENT定时任务
Select SITE_USERID from proj where projid = ‘xxxxx
//根据SITE_USERID查询EVENT
select * from mrievent where userid = 'xxxxxxxxx'
//然后将其删除
Delete from mrievent where eventid = ‘’
//如果有关联eventparameter表则对应删除
qa_pairs.source: 文档来源：财务部要求停止生成Rentup
